page.title: 14KILBURN(DERBY):SPORTS CENTRE
page.content: { BELPER SPORTS CENTRE} Belper Sports Centre is situated on the outskirts of the town on Kilburn Road. It is 11years old and was opened on Tuesday 17 December 1974 by Dennis Howell M.P. It is a dual purpose centre intended to provide sports facilites for Belper High School, which is built adjoining the centre, and facilities for use by the public. The High School has priority over the public during school hours but in the year April 84_March 85 137,640 people used the centre. The Sports Centre and Belper High School share a site which covers 120,000 square metres. Included in this area are; the High School building, the outdoor sports facilities, rural studies facilities and car parking space.
